Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 18 Uppannattika » 18.7 Pañhāvāra » 18.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 18.7.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Indriya
Uppannattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Indriya
15.
2613Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo—  uppannā indriyā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe…  cakkhundriyaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa…pe…  kāyindriyaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa…pe…  rūpajīvitindriyaṃ kaṭattārūpānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo. (1)
<< Āhāraup Jhānādi >>
